manageTasks: Manage tasks, track maintenance, and keep your fleet running smoothly with CarMinder.
fleetManagementDescription: Easily manage all vehicles in your fleet from one central location.
taskSchedulingDescription: Plan and schedule maintenance tasks for each vehicle with ease.
maintenanceTrackingDescription: Keep a detailed record of all maintenance tasks performed on your vehicles.
alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
enterEmailForReset: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
Carminder is an intuitive mobile applica: Carminder is an intuitive mobile application designed to help you keep your vehicle in optimal condition. It reminds you when to perform important maintenance tasks, such as oil changes, tire rotations, and scheduled inspections.
How do I set up my vehicle in Carminder?: How do I set up my vehicle in Carminder?
Simply open the app, tap on \"Add vehicl: Simply open the app, tap on "Add vehicle" and follow the instructions to enter your car's make, model, and year.
Can I use Carminder for multiple vehicle: Can I use Carminder for multiple vehicles?
Yes! You can add multiple vehicles and m: Yes! You can add multiple vehicles and manage maintenance for all of them from a single account.
Most basic functions are available offli: Most basic functions are available offline, but you'll need internet access for features like workshop locator and database updates.
How can I get technical support?: How can I get technical support?
Visit our Support section or send us an: Visit our Support section or send us an email at help@carminder.com.
